text: Ezɨ me ghua bizir kamɨn gun mɨkemezɨ, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn garir gumazibar dapanim ko ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba pura nɨghnɨsi, bizir tizitam uam otogham?5:24 Grighɨn akam, vezɨn kamɨn deragha bigha mɨkemezir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba akar kam giragha ghaze, “Me nɨghnɨgha egha ghaze, bizir tizim datɨrɨghɨn otogham?”
